short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces notion's dynamic favicons with their default favicon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notion dynamically changes favicons based on the page's icon. This makes it frustrating to determine at a glance which tab is the notion tab. This extension resets favicons on all notion tabs to the default favicon.
